centralpark1.description: We celebrated the sunshine by taking a trip to San Ramon's Central Park. It's a bit of a trek, but their water playground is superb.
centralpark1.title: Centralpark 1

centralpark2.description: The boys were excited to trade their boots and jackets for shorts and baseball hats.
centralpark2.title: Centralpark 2

centralpark3.description:
Picnic in San Ramon.

Notice Mimi? Milo increasingly wants to bring him everywhere.
centralpark3.title: Centralpark 3

easter1.description:
Amy, one of the yogamoms, organized a post-Easter egg hunt in her backyard. It was a Kodak moment: 10 toddlers (and Felix) earnestly egg hunting, and 10 moms snapping photos.

We gave Felix a handicap: he could only pick up blue eggs.
easter1.title: Easter 1

easter2.description:
Standing up, left to right: Saia, Eliot and Kai.
Sitting down, left to right: Leo, Argil (half hidden), Jaime, Felix, Milo, Lexi (a recent addition to our group), Ariel and Peter.
easter2.title: Easter 2

easter3.description: What are Argil and Felix looking at?
easter3.title: Easter 3

easter4.description:
Bubbles!

Milo is more interested in the marshmallow Peeps.
easter4.title: Easter 4

easter5.description: Milo and Kai have a tea party. This is one of Milo's very favorite games of the moment. He loves the pouring, the drinking, and the sharing. He hands you a cup with a most delightful "tea?"
easter5.title: Easter 5

haircut1.description: Dean got a haircut. Some shagginess and sideburn remain, but the look is more surfer and less homeless shelter.
haircut1.title: Haircut 1

haircut2.description: Lucie also got a haircut. It's reminiscent of one she had in high school, when she met Dean.
haircut2.title: Haircut 2

totland1.description: Mom, put down the camera and play ball!
totland1.title: Totland 1

totland2.description: Did we mention how good it feels to be in shorts and sandals again?
totland2.title: Totland 2

description: At long last, a sunny week! The bay area is breathing a giant collective sigh of relief.
title: April 23
